thread.title: Floating food could become future eating craze

title: Floating food could become future eating craze
text:
Floating food could become future eating craze Monday, February 05, 2018 - 01:33 
Researchers at the universities of Sussex and Bristol have created TastyFloats - a prototype device that uses acoustic levitation to suspend tiny items of food and drink in mid-air. Jim Drury has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Researchers at the universities of Sussex and Bristol have created TastyFloats - a prototype device that uses acoustic levitation to suspend tiny items of food and drink in mid-air. Jim Drury has more. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2E36ACN
